Neste site pretendemos manter contato co: On this website we intend to maintain constant contact with all our master's, doctorate and post-doctoral graduates from the postgraduate program in Electrical Engineering at the Federal University of Uberlândia (PPGEELT). In addition to collecting information from our graduates to better understand the impacts of our training, we intend to use these numbers to guide improvements and provide the general public with an overview of the impact of PPGEELT. Also foster new opportunities and propose interactions to your entire community.
Aqui você encontrará a lista das pessoas: Here you will find the list of people who graduated from PPGEELT over the years, whether in the master's degree, doctorate or post-doctorate of our program.
*Se for sua primeira vez se conectando,: *If this is your first time logging in, the default password is your CPF without dots and dashes.
Este é o site de acompanhamento dos egre: This is the website for monitoring UFU postgraduate graduates. In it, we provide a series of information for the general public and also create a support structure for our graduates. This is the website for monitoring UFU postgraduate graduates.
